name: The Fallen Night
description:
Teleport to the battlefield in the Middle Ages and become a ruthless warrior, gain experience, acquire skills and show what you are made of because your survival will depend on you and only on you, since on the battlefield there is no mercy.

The Fallen Night is a medieval action game with a quality combat system based on research, something that can amaze you, with a great aspiration, to become an Online RPG, it is also a multi-genre game capable of giving you a variety of entertainment (this feature is currently disabled).

Note: It is not an authentic combat simulator but it is extremely realistic in combat.

Includes:
7 Maps (2 integrated maps to optimize)
2 Modes (+5 Mode in development)
4 Mode Decorator
8 Armies (+6 Armies in development)
Offline Features (+Online Features in Development)
+50 Weapons To Select
Knight, Archer, Warrior and Paladin Class

In Development:
Guard and Patrol Work.

Coming soon In Development:
Story mode.
Possibility to select your character.
Ninja and Berserker class.
